recipe.title: Refried Beans
recipe.subtitle: For 4 servings of nachos or 2 main course servings.
recipe.ingredients: 2 onions, chopped 2 garlic cloves ] Tbsp oil 1 green capsicum (optional) 1 red capsicum (optional) 1/2 tsp chilli powder 2 tsp ground cumin 1 tsp oreganum, crumbled 1â€”2 cooked carrots (optional) 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 tsp sugar 425 g can kidney beans 1 rounded Tbsp tomato paste
recipe.steps: In a medium-to-large frypan cook the onion and garlic in the oil until onion is transparent but not brown. Add the roughly chopped capsicums if using, cover the pan and cook until capsicums have heated through. Remove lid and stir in the chilli powder, cumin and oreganum, and cook for about 1 minute longer. Mash the cooked carrot with a fork if using. Add to the pan with the salt and sugar. Drain the kidney beans, reserving the liquid, then add the drained beans and the tomato paste to the rest of the ingredients in the pan. Heat through, using a moderate heat, mashing the mixture with a fork or potato masher. Thin down with some of the bean liquid if you want a wetter mixture. Adjust seasonings to taste.
